programme.title: Christmas Island
programme.desc: When a snowstorm diverts Kate's first private flight to Christmas Island, she must team up with an air traffic controller to secure her dream job as the family's pilot.

programme.title: 'Twas the Date Before Christmas
programme.desc: Feeling the pressure to bring someone home for Christmas, Jessie convinces Bryan to join her family for a day filled with holiday events, only the family doesn't know it's their first date.

programme.title: Lights, Camera, Christmas!
programme.desc: A woman signs on to be a costume designer for a movie that's shooting in he hometown. While rediscovering her passion for the craft, she winds up falling for the film's famous leading man.

programme.title: A Fabled Holiday
programme.desc: Talia and her childhood best friend unexpectedly reunite in a curiously familiar-looking town that's full of Christmas spirit.

programme.title: Once Upon a Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Told she would have less than a few months to live without a new liver, Heather's time was running out when a kind stranger heard of her plight and discovered he was a perfect match. The two met and before long a friendship developed into romance.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Sarah heads to her uncle's ranch to escape New York and the spotlight from a breakup. Returning home for the first time since her aunt passed, complications arise when Graham, a Hollywood star, arrives at the ranch to prepare for his next film.

programme.title: A Veteran's Christmas
programme.desc: Capt. Grace Garland, a decorated U.S. veteran, returns home after two tours of search and rescue in Afghanistan. After being separated from her beloved K9 partner, Grace must rediscover the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: Private Princess Christmas
programme.desc: After failing in her royal duties, Princess Violet is sent to an American leadership training program where she makes and unexpected connection with the stoic instructor, Captain Ryan.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful Mrs. Miracle
programme.desc: Mrs. Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire, following their grandmother's passing.

programme.title: Miracle in Bethlehem, PA
programme.desc: A single woman with a newly adopted baby gets stuck in Bethlehem, Pa.; with no room at the inn, she's forced to stay with a stranger who turns out to be the miracle she has needed.

programme.title: Following Yonder Star
programme.desc: A former television star waits out a scandal in Vermont. She becomes close with the innkeeper and his daughter while she helps him direct the local Christmas pageant.

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas
programme.desc: As Christmas nears, heiress Jessica Morgan seizes what seems like her last chance to experience a relaxed Christmas and heads off to the small town of Glenbrooke, where she meets a handsome fireman.

programme.title: To All a Good Night
programme.desc: A small-town photographer saves the life of a mysterious man who may just be here to buy her family's parkland.

programme.title: Time for Them to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A woman with amnesia catches a ride with her handsome nurse to investigate the only clue to her identity: a newspaper clipping for a Christmas festival with a cryptic invitation.

programme.title: A Bramble House Christmas
programme.desc: While settling his father's estate, a man becomes suspicious as to why the man left his nurse a large sum of money after knowing her for less than two months before he died.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Miracle of Love
programme.desc: Joy and Eric find a new sense of purpose -- and get a chance at love -- as they work together to build a home for a family during Christmastime.

programme.title: Christmas at Holly Lodge
programme.desc: Sophie Bennett, the owner of the Holly Lodge, tries to convince a developer that the lodge is actually a bad investment.

programme.title: A Reason for the Season
programme.desc: In order to earn her trust fund and with the help of a handsome local attorney, Evie is tasked with granting Christmas wishes to the people who saved her life on the night of her birth.

programme.title: Five More Minutes: Moments Like These
programme.desc: Returning to her old home for the holidays, a young widow's Christmas wish for her son gets answered in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Merry & Bright
programme.desc: Merry and Bright Candy Cane Company owner Cate meets a man during the busy Christmas season and assumes he is the suitor her mother is trying to set her up with.

programme.title: Hope at Christmas

programme.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas

programme.title: A Dance in the Snow

programme.desc: Bokseri, fudbaleri, košarkaši... Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bugarski kup: 1/8 Finala: Lokomotiv Sofia - Botev Plovdiv
programme.desc: Kup Bugarske u fudbalu održava se još od 1938. godine. U takmičenju učestvuju svi zvanično registrovani klubovi, sve utakmice se igraju na sistem eliminacija, sve do polufinala kada se igraju i...

programme.title: ATP Uncovered
programme.desc: Teniseri su gotovo celu godinu na putovanjima. Saznajte nešto više o tome kako izgleda njihov život na terenu i van njega i kako organizatori ATP turnira rešavaju slatke i gorke muke koje imaju.
